content: Is there a way to run the asm tests on another target than the current machine? For example running the aarch64 tests on a x86_64 machine. It would be helpful so that I don't have to try and guess the formatting of errors and then wait for CI to fail to tell me I missed a space or forgot something.
I doubt it's possible generally because of the run-pass tests, but if I could at least get the fail to compile ones working to fix stderr that would be nice
Have a look at the tests in src/tests/assembly

This commit https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/commit/775eeb32ca5ef218c24c38c0264c1b8dedb501a1 removed the old emulated aarch64 test build - it might still work if you put it back (or else steal the emulation parts and put them in another job)
